master

Class USLocalizer

  • java.lang.Object
    • master.USLocalizer

  • public class USLocalizer
extends java.lang.Object
    One of the first stages of the robot. This is the initial localization to find out which corner the robot is in. This routine makes use of the walls at the corners to find its absolute theta. Once the theta is known then finding which corner the robot is situated in is easy (i.e. If the walls are at 0 and 90 degrees then you're in the top left corner)
    Author:
    alex
